sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const MovieInfo = ({ image, title, plot, released, genre, rating, boxoffice, actor }) => { return (

{title}

IMDB: {rating}

{plot}

Genre: {genre}
Released Date: {released}

Plot

{plot}

Cast: {actor}

Rating: {rating}, BoxOffice: {boxoffice}

) } export default MovieInfo
